Name: Composite of Samples
Definition: A composite work containing new material and one or more samples of pre-existing recorded works.

Name: Medley
Definition: A continuous and sequential combination of existing works or excerpts.

Name: Potpourri
Definition: A composite work with the addition of original material which have been combined to form a new work, that has been published and printed

Name: Unspecified Composite
Definition: Works known to be a composite but where the type of composite is unknown.
